```{r}
####################################################
# Practical 1: Marginal Models for Continuous Data #
####################################################

######
# Q5 #
######

# F-test
anova(fm_3, Terms = c('ns(year, 3):sex', 'ns(year, 3):drug'))


# LRT
fm_3_noInt <- gls(prothrombin ~ ns(year, 3) + sex + drug + age, data = pbc2, 
                  correlation = corCAR1(form = ~ year | id))

anova(fm_3_noInt, fm_3)


fm_3ML <- gls(prothrombin ~ ns(year, 3) * (sex + drug) + age, data = pbc2, 
            correlation = corCAR1(form = ~ year | id), method = "ML")

fm_3ML_noInt <- gls(prothrombin ~ ns(year, 3) + sex + drug + age, data = pbc2, 
                  correlation = corCAR1(form = ~ year | id), method = "ML")

anova(fm_3ML_noInt, fm_3ML)
```
